structure.unit: LEVEES, DRAINAGE, AND RECLAMATION OF LANDS

law.text: Refunding bonds may be issued and sold, and assessments may be levied and collected to retire the refunding bonds, in the manner provided in KRS 269.010 to 269.050.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2380-34.
